description: This file is an __init__.py module in a Python package for the UniversalInit Environment, handling environment variable mapping and re-exporting functions from another module.

methods.name: get_template_path
methods.description: Retrieves the path to the template directory or file used in environment variable mapping.

methods.name: parse_template_file
methods.description: Parses a template file to extract environment variable mappings or configurations.

methods.name: map_common_to_framework
methods.description: Converts common environment variable formats to framework-specific formats.

methods.name: map_framework_to_common
methods.description: Converts framework-specific environment variables to a common format.

methods.name: get_supported_frameworks
methods.description: Returns a list of supported frameworks that can be mapped.

methods.name: apply_wildcard_mapping
methods.description: Applies wildcard patterns to map multiple environment variables efficiently.
